post.title: different between samsung vibrant (bell canada) and samsung galaxy s i9000 (h.k.)
post.content: look like they are the same phone but i don't seem to locate any detail... by compare the spec. they're pretty much the same. vibrant - http://galaxys.bell.ca/index.html i9000 - http://hk.samsungmobile.com/eng/mobi...laxys_20100727 any idea?
